ComicInfo.Summary:
Realizing that the news media thrives on conflict, the attention-hungry heroes of Hashtag: Danger must contrive a fake super-villain fight! PLUS! Snelson eats in a restaurant and it doesn't go well. EXTRA! Eclectic and handsomely illustrated AHOY text shorts! Painted cover by Richard Williams (MAD, Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Terror).
ContentsHashtag: Danger (Mission 000010) Through the Valley of Shadows!, Part 1Part 2: Trial By Terror!Part 3: Blood and Honor!EpilogueSnelson: What's the Deal With Eating In Restaurants?The Pitch Meeting For Your Local Bank8-BallWhen We Get Done With Mr. GiraffeNote: This is the only mission that isn't actually numbered, however, it's the mission between 000009 (previous issue) and 000011 (next issue), respectively.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-30 10:57:06. [CVDB710741] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 16:25:19. [Issue ID 1974523]
ComicInfo.Writer: Carol Lay,Matt Buechele,Paul Constant,Robert Jeschonek,Tom Peyer,Tom Peyer
ComicInfo.Penciller: Carol Lay,Chris Giarrusso,Danny Schwartz,David Hicock,Fred Harper,Chris Giarrusso
ComicInfo.Inker: Carol Lay,Chris Giarrusso,Danny Schwartz,David Hicock,Fred Harper,Chris Giarrusso
ComicInfo.Title: What's the Deal With Eating in Restaurants?; Through the Valley of Shadows
